TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChannelPoolSettings extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定属于服务终结点使用的通道池的通道配额。

span.span: Specifies quotas for channels that belong to a pool of channels used by a service endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配额用作一种策略机制，防止消耗过多资源。Quotas are used as a policy mechanism to prevent the consumption of excessive resources. 它们可防止恶意或无意的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击。They prevent Denial of Service (DOS) attacks that are either malicious or unintentional. 在设置自定义通道的通道配额时使用此类。Use this class when setting channel quotas on a custom channel. 指定三项配额： specifies three quotas: - ，用于指定池中的通道在关闭前可空闲的最大时间间隔。 to specify the maximum interval of time for which the channels in the pool can be idle before being closed. - ，用于指定从通道返回池到通道关闭之间的时间间隔。 to specify the interval of time after which a channel, when returned to the pool, is closed. - ，用于指定每个远程终结点的池中可存储的最大通道数量。 to specify the maximum number of channels that can be stored in the pool for each remote endpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值设置为：The default values set are: - : 2 分钟。: 2 minutes. - ：10 分钟。: 10 minutes. - ：10 个通道。: 10 channels. 这些默认配额值基于资源的保守适度分配，适用于开发环境和小型安装方案。These default quota values are based on a conservatively modest allocation of resources that are suitable for development environments and small installation scenarios. 如果某个安装耗尽了资源或是连接受到限制，则无论是否还有其他资源可用，服务管理员都应检查通道配额并调整各个配额值。Service administrators should review channel quotas and tune individual quota values if an installation is running out of resources or if connections are being limited despite the availability of additional resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan IdleTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置池中的通道在关闭前可空闲的最大时间间隔。

span.span: Get or sets the maximum interval of time for which the channels in the pool can be idle before being closed.

value.span: ，指定池中的通道在关闭前可空闲的最大时间间隔。

span.span: The that specifies the maximum interval of time for which the channels in the pool can be idle before being closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配额用于减少通过长时间占用资源来对服务器实施的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击。The quota is used to mitigate Denial of Service (DOS) attacks on the server that rely on tying up resources for an extended period of time. 在客户端，设置正确的值可增加与服务连接的可靠性。On the client, setting the correct value can increase the reliability of connecting with the service. 默认值基于资源的保守适度分配。The default value is based on a conservatively modest allocation of resources. 该值适用于开发环境和小型安装方案。It is suitable for a development environment and small installation scenarios. 如果某个安装耗尽了资源或是连接受到限制，则无论是否还有其他资源可用，服务管理员都应检查该值。Service administrators should review the value if an installation is running out of resources or if connections are being limited despite the availability of additional resources.

exception.span: 值小于零或大于 T:System.Int32.MaxValue（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The value is less than zero or greater than T:System.Int32.MaxValue in milliseconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan LeaseTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置通道在关闭前的生存期。

span.span: Gets or sets the lifetime of a channel, after which it is closed.

value.span: 一个 ，指定通道在关闭前的生存期。

span.span: A that specifies the lifetime of a channel, after which it is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配额用于与负载平衡器的集成以及提高可靠性。The quota is used to for integration with load balancers and for improving reliability. 默认值基于资源的保守分配。The default value is based on a conservative allocation of resources. 该值适用于开发环境和小型安装方案。It is suitable for a development environment and small installation scenarios. 如果某个安装耗尽了资源或是连接受到限制，则无论是否还有其他资源可用，服务管理员都应检查该值。Service administrators should review the value if an installation is running out of resources or if connections are being limited despite the availability of additional resources.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxOutboundChannelsPerEndpoint { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可由服务启动的连接到远程终结点的最大通道数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of channels connecting to remote endpoints that can be initiated by the service.

value.span: 一个正整数，指定池中可由服务启动的连接到远程终结点的最大通道数目。

span.span: A positive integer that specifies the maximum number of channels to a remote endpoint in the pool that can be initiated by the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配额设置服务器与客户端上的缓存限制，用于提高可靠性。The quota sets cache limits on both the server and the client and is used to improve reliability. 其默认值基于资源的保守适度分配，适用于开发环境和小型安装方案。The default value is based on a conservatively modest allocation of resources that is suitable for a development environment and small installation scenarios. 如果某个安装耗尽了资源或是连接受到限制，则无论是否还有其他资源可用，服务管理员都应检查该值。Service administrators should review the value if an installation is running out of resources or if connections are being limited despite the availability of additional resources.

span.span: The value is less than zero.
